description:
The people of Wulfenstein have locked and barred their doors and windows, hiding from whatever it isthat is making the dreadful, growling you can hear echoing along the village streets.
Your hackles rise, your wolfish senses recoiling in the presence of something bestial and malign.
As you creep throug the eerily empty sheets, you hear panting and the scrape of claws on cobblestones.
Shadows loom around a street comer...
Something is comming
It is at that moment that a gaunt old man sticks his wild haired head out from an alleyway and beckons to you with a long-nailed finger.
"Stranger, if you want to live, come with me".

exits.description: Prepare to face whatever is comming.
